examples.topics_comparison module¶

examples.topics_comparison.generate_and_store_models(path, documents, plot_first_name)[source]¶
examples.topics_comparison.store_plots(models: List[models.topics.TopicsModel], coherence_values: List[float], tsne=True)[source]¶

Given a list of models and a list of coherence values, stores the plots of the wordclouds and the tsne html interactive plot in the dir_path of the model with max coherence value.

Parameters

tsne – If true, calculates tsne and stores plot.
